title: Gardening Tips App
description: A platform where gardeners can share tips. Features login, CRUD operations, and public/private tip visibility. Built with MongoDB and Express.
challenge: Building a secure system for public vs private tips and making sure user-based access control worked correctly across CRUD operations.

title: Assignment Portal
description: A student-teacher assignment management system. Teachers can create, view, and mark assignments. Students can submit via Google Docs links.
challenge: Making sure teachers couldn't mark their own submissions and handling real-time data syncing between roles was a fun challenge.

title: Dragon News
description: A modern news portal built with React, React Router, and Firebase authentication. It allows users to read news articles, view categories, and log in to access premium content.
challenge: Setting up protected routes for premium content and integrating Firebase authentication with route-level access control was a key learning experience.
